name: Look Ahead
description:
Face treacherous dangers and use your head to overcome the many challenges you will find in Look Ahead! Will you be able to reach "the garden"?

Made with love for the GGJam 2021 by F4STUDIO (and some friends)

Designers

Alessandro Del Gatto
Davide Perdon

Programmer
Martin Babino

Concept Artists 
Federico Cao
Daiana Gigliotti
Sofia Malossini
Andrea Molteni

Voices and sounds
Marco Cominassi
